title: Groundhog Day - Multi Audio & Subs (See Post)
description:
This is the Collectors Edition that ahs: Director's commentary / Documentary - The Weight of Time / Filmographies / Animated Menus 





Audio: English / German / French / Spanish / Italian




Subtitles: English / German / French / Spanish / Italian / Arabic / Bulgarian / Croatian / Czech / Danish / Dutch / Finnish / Greek / Hebrew / Hindi / Hungarian / Icelandic / Norwegian / Polish / Portuguese / Swedish / Turkish





PAL





882 x 8MB packets 

Initial Seeding Process Used (This means the quicker you upload the 8MB I send to you the faster you get another one from me.)





A weather man is reluctantly sent to cover a story about a weather forecasting "rat" (as he calls it). This is his fourth year on the story, and he makes no effort to hide his frustration. On awaking the 'following' day he discovers that it's Groundhog Day again, and again, and again. First he uses this to his advantage, then comes the realisation that he is doomed to spend the rest of eternity in the same place, seeing the same people do the same thing EVERY day. 





***** As Always, My Thanks in advance to those who stay on to seed after their download has been completed it is much appreciated *****
